nodes.text: Atravis was an astronomical object located in the regions known as the Outer Rim Territories and the Western Reaches. It was also situated in the grid square L-19 of the Standard Galactic Grid. The super-hyperroute known as the Hydian Way connected Atravis to Rutan and Shumavar. Atravis also shared its name with the Atravis sector, which contained the nearby Mustafar system.

Atravis was first depicted in the new Star Wars canon on a galactic map in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a 2016 Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars Roleplaying boxed set. The Atravis system was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
